name: Unstable Selection
description:
Unstable Selection is a whimsical action Rogue-like about mutation. It is for action-Roguelite fans of all ages.

Adapt to a hostile environment by absorbing the abilities of the creatures you defeat, and become who you were meant to be!

Features
  • Procedurally generated maps in 3 unique environments
  • 14 different abilities that can be used by all enemies and the player
  • 8 different status effects that can augment many abilities
  • Each run has a unique seed that can be used to retry a run
Control
  • Playable with controller or mouse and keyboard
Credits

Unstable Selection is made by team Ursine Amoeba

UCSC Team:

James Morrow Dan Cochran Ben Mages Fernando Briones Katie Liu

Sound Designer:
